title: Push notification detail

xdm:token.description: Valid push token for the given push platform.
xdm:token.title: Push Token

xdm:platform.description: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm
xdm:platform.title: Push Platform

xdm:blocklisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use denylisted instead.
xdm:blocklisted.title: Blocklist Flag

xdm:appID.description: Unique Identifier for the mobile application.
xdm:appID.title: Application Identifier

xdm:identiy.description: The identity associated with this token before profile stitching. Deprecated due to typo, use xdm:identity instead.
xdm:identiy.title: Identity associated with this token

xdm:blacklisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blacklisted. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use blocklisted instead.
xdm:blacklisted.title: Blacklist Flag

xdm:denylisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider.
xdm:denylisted.title: Denylist Flag

xdm:identity.description: The identity associated with this token before profile stitching.
xdm:identity.title: Identity associated with this token
